title: MASterSelects - Professional In-Browser Video Editor
subtitle: GPU-Accelerated Video Editing Powered by WebGPU with No Uploads or Subscriptions
description: MASterSelects is a powerful video editor that runs entirely in your browser with no uploads, no server processing, and no subscription required. Built with WebGPU for hardware-accelerated rendering, it leverages your local GPU to deliver professional-grade video editing at 60fps.
